page.title: 07N.DEVON COLLEGE BARNSTAPLE.
page.content: The{college}was built in four different stages; the oldest in 1953 and the final part in 1975.Counting playing field space,it covers 25 acres. The public can use its facilities by hiring out its build ings.The{college}runs two restaurants and does hair dressing.It has 125 full time and 100 part time teachers.There are about 1300 full time students and about 2000 part time.To do an{"A"level course you need 4_5{"O"levels.}The day release students come at 6am and stay sometimes till 9.30pm.Most evening courses are on a Wednesday,Tuesday or Thursday,each with 20_30 courses.The principal thinks it's better to go to {college}to get{"A" levels}and thereby a better job.He believes those people who are not able to gain from an{"A" {level}course should still go for further education at evening courses.
